notes: abstract noun often used with the definite article 'il domani' to mean the future
example_sentence_english: I feel that tomorrow is uncertain.

notes: used to mean 'a future' (poetic or abstract use)
example_sentence_italian: Ho speranze per un domani migliore.
example_sentence_english: I have hopes for a better future.
The future belongs to the young.

example_sentence_italian: I domani non sono tutti uguali.
example_sentence_english: Tomorrows are not all the same.

example_sentence_italian: Non so cosa accadrà ai domani.
example_sentence_english: I do not know what will happen to the tomorrows.

example_sentence_italian: Riceviamo segni dai domani che verranno.
example_sentence_english: We receive signs from the tomorrows to come.
We will meet in the future.
I believe in the tomorrows we will build.

example_sentence_italian: Ho scritto un articolo sul domani.
example_sentence_english: I wrote an article about tomorrow.
I have data on possible tomorrows.
We build with tomorrow in mind.
